uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp

Class UnitDisplayFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.text.Format
      • java.text.NumberFormat
        • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.UnitDisplayFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class UnitDisplayFormat
extends java.text.NumberFormat
    A NumberFormat for storage units for displaying arbitrary values The largest unit that is less than the value is used by default.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
